content:
Since you attended a business meeting in Chicago, it's likely that the trip can be categorized as a business expense. You can keep track of the expenses related to this trip, such as the flight, accommodations, meals, and any other business-related expenses, and claim them on your taxes as a business expense.

Next, let's move on to the Dallas trip. What was the purpose of your trip to Dallas? Was it for business or personal reasons?
